text: @Mike_Pence No regard for protecting the lives of US citizens from COVID19. You nominally have led the Trump Admin task force. Besides from congratulating yourselves over abd over it has been an epic failure; 140,000 lives have been lan st through denial of science and facts. Take a seat!
